text: The 1924 Southern Conference Men's Basketball Tournament took place from February 28–March 4, 1924, at Municipal Auditorium in Atlanta, Georgia. The North Carolina Tar Heels won their second Southern Conference title, led by head coach Norman Shepard.Southern Conference Tournament Results. p. 6.
